about.title: A propos
about.description:
Je suis développeur full-stack, actuellement focus sur des développements Javascript (React / Gatsby / NodeJs), la création de solution e-commerce (Shopify) et la transformation de Wordpress en Headless CMS.

J'ai travaillé sur plusieurs stacks (React, NodeJs, Shopify app, CI/CD... ), plusieurs en environments et pour différents type de compagnies (Startup, Scale up).

Je travail actuellement en distanciel en tant que développeur confirmé sur essentiellement des projets Javascript, React/Gatsby, NodeJS and Shopify.

experience.description:
Working providing development services and solution architecture.
Help companies to scale up their business by providing custom solutions.
Shopify, React, Gatsby, Wordpress, AWS
I joined the company as Lead developer, leading the web development and helping with the architecture and coordination of the e-commerce, the marketing and the infrastructure.
I joined the company in the plugin team to develop a payment plugin for WooCommerce, Shopify, Sales Force Commerce Cloud and also a full javascript one based on DOM through GTM.
Responsible of the company websites (Wordpress) all around the world (15 countries / languages including Hebrew) and connect it to an internal tool for billing ressources, schedule appointments.

Develop many websites or solutions for clients like retailers, small and medium company, coachs...
Always focus on ROI, SEO and performance.

Build a company from scratch with my father to repair computers, provide IT maintenance to small companies and for individuals.
Services like sell and setup servers, routers (Windows / Cisco)

publications.title: React Native for beginners
publications.description: Online training recorded for spanish e-learning platform. The training is for JS developers willing to learn the basics of ReactNative

publications.title: React Native intermediate level
publications.description: Online training recorded for spanish e-learning platform. The training is for developers who know a little bit of ReactNative and wants to learn more about the platform
